name: Timebomb
descriptions: Timebomb is a badly-injured patient at Red's clinic in Big Town in Fallout 3.
Timebomb, like every other inhabitant of Big Town, came from Little Lamplight.

Currently laid out in a coma in the operating room of Red's clinic, Timebomb was severely wounded during the last super mutant attack, when Red and Shorty were kidnapped. He has very few memories of his injury,
If the Lone Wanderer speaks to Bittercup, she will say she had a relationship with Timebomb.
Playstation 3 Despite being in a coma, he will talk and clap his hands when lying unconscious on the gurney.

topics.topic_text: You had seven bullet wounds and broke both clavicles. Should be fine now.
topics.response_text: Wow. That's ... you saved my life! Thanks. You're a good person, you know that?

topics.topic_text: It wasn't free. Doctor's fees are expensive. Understand?
topics.response_text: Oh, yeah, sure. I understand. Here. That's all I have.

topics.topic_text: You're welcome. Don't do anything strenuous for a few weeks.
topics.response_text: Alright. I'll be careful. I promise.

topics.topic_text: I wanted you to be conscious before I killed you.
topics.response_text: Ah, shit.{Timebomb is NOT having a good day.}

topics.topic_text: Nothing happened. I just need you to answer some questions.
topics.response_text: Oh, uh, okay. Whatever you say.{Timebomb is woozy and lightheaded. He just survived some brutal injuries.}

topics.topic_text: Bittercup tells me the two of you had a thing together.
topics.response_text: We did? Wow, that's news to me. How long was I unconscious, again?

topics.topic_text: Do you have any traders in town? Any doctors?
topics.response_text: Well, you've seen the clinic. Red's the smart one in Bigtown. I'd ask her.{Timebomb is amazingly calm.}

topics.topic: BigtownTownWhatsWrongThis place looks like a ghost town.
topics.topic_text: Do you know anything about the Super Mutant attacks?
topics.response_text: I remember screaming and gunfire. One of those big, hulking things shot at me. That's all I can think of.{Timebomb is eerily calm. He's still half-out of it from his injuries.}

topics.topic: BigtownTownWhereDidYouComeFromWhere did you people come from, anyway?
topics.topic_text: Tell me how Big Town got started.
topics.response_text: Whoa, that was a long time ago. I'm not sure when, but everyone who grows up in Lamplight ends up here. Not too many of us left.{Timebomb is eerily calm. He's still a bit woozy from the injuries.}

topics.topic_text: You live here, right? What do you know about the people?
topics.response_text: Oh, yeah! I can tell you all about them, if you want. Let's see...{He is still half-awake, due to his injuries.}
I'm watching. Go on. Teach us what to do.
Uh ... do I look like I have any money on me? I'm sorry, I can't pay you anything.

conversation.response_text: Um, Yeah. Yeah, they are.{Timebomb can't think of a proper response, so he just agrees.}
Yeah, yeah. I'm fine, Red. Super fine. Super duper fine. That Wastelander saved me!{Timebomb is grateful but socially awkward.}
Hurray!{(cheering) in an excited cheering mob}
